org.iges.util
Class Range

java.lang.Object
  org.iges.util.Range
public class Range
extends java.lang.Object

This is actually a container for three similar classes, Range.Double, Range.Long, and Range.Date. All represent an interval, either of real #s, integers, or time. The methods are similar in function, but take different primitive types as arguments Although there is no formal relationship between them, they are grouped together to emphasize their similarity.
